plot: A profile of Kiwi mountaineer, Mark Whetu, who survived a night on the summit of Everest and was forced to leave his climbing partner and friend, Mike Reinberger, to die.
title: Climbing Star
plot_es: A profile of Kiwi mountaineer, Mark Whetu, who survived a night on the summit of Everest and was forced to leave his climbing partner and friend, Mike Reinberger, to die.
plot_en: A profile of Kiwi mountaineer, Mark Whetu, who survived a night on the summit of Everest and was forced to leave his climbing partner and friend, Mike Reinberger, to die.
